thread.section_title: LOLA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LOLA | mylola.com | 2 of 11
thread.title: frontdesk biotek

author: frontdesk biotek
title: frontdesk biotek
text: Not only was the delivery date correct, the packaging discrete and the product all natural, BUT you get to select exactly what you need. I mean, in what other situation can you get the exact multi-pack of both pads and/or tampons that you need each month and only have to buy one pack? And they even send you a reminder to cancel your next order before you are charged. I have signed up for many monthly clubs that bill you each month but allow you to skip, like JustFab, and I have never gotten a reminder to skip. That is just phenomenal customer service. So happy I made this switch. AND no running to the store to buy whatever product they have on my lunch break. Love this service and product.
